item.text: In the year of King Uzziah’s death, I saw the Lord seated on a high, elevated throne. The hem of his robe filled the temple.

<st data-num="08314" class="">Seraphs</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05975" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="04605" class="">over</st> him; each <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> had <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st>. With <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> wings they <st data-num="03680" class="">covered</st> their <st data-num="06440" class="">faces</st>, with <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> they <st data-num="03680" class="">covered</st> their <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st>,<n id="2" /> and they used the remaining <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> to <st data-num="05774" class="">fly</st>.
They called out to one another, “Holy, holy, holy is the Lord of Heaven’s Armies! His majestic splendor fills the entire earth!”
The sound of their voices shook the door frames, and the temple was filled with smoke.
I said, “Woe to me! I am destroyed, for my lips are contaminated by sin, and I live among people whose lips are contaminated by sin. My eyes have seen the king, the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.”

But then <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="08314" class="">seraphs</st> <st data-num="05774" class="">flew</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st> me. In his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> was a <st data-num="07531" class="">hot coal</st> he had <st data-num="03947" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> with <st data-num="04457" class="">tongs</st>.

He <st data-num="05060 05921">touched</st> my <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st> with it and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> coal has <st data-num="05060 05921">touched</st> your <st data-num="08193" class="">lips</st>. Your <st data-num="05771" class="">evil</st> is <st data-num="05493" class="">removed</st>; your <st data-num="02403" class="">sin</st> is <st data-num="03722" class="">forgiven</st>.”<n id="1" />

I <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> the <st data-num="06963" class="">voice</st> of the <st data-num="0136">Lord</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Whom</st> will I <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st>? <st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> will <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> on our behalf?”<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="0559" class="">answered</st>, “<st data-num="02005" class="">Here</st> I <st data-num="02005" class="">am</st>, <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> me!”

He said, “Go and tell these people:

“‘Listen continually, but don’t understand.

Look continually, but don’t perceive.’

Make the hearts of these people calloused;

make their ears deaf and their eyes blind.

Otherwise they might see with their eyes and hear with their ears,

their hearts might understand and they might repent and be healed.”

I replied, “How long, Lord?” He said,

“Until cities are in ruins and unpopulated,

and houses are uninhabited,

and the land is ruined and devastated,

and the Lord has sent the people off to a distant place,

and the very heart of the land is completely abandoned.

Even if only a tenth of the people remain in the land,

it will again be destroyed,

like one of the large sacred trees or an Asherah pole,

when a sacred pillar on a high place is thrown down.

That sacred pillar symbolizes the special chosen family.”
